Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface ConnectionInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientConnection, ClientHandler
public interface ConnectionInterface
Interface that represent the basic function of the connection, both server and client side

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean isConnectionActive()
    Check if the connection is active
    Message receiveMessage()
    Receive a message through the input stream
    void sendMessage​(Message message)
    Send a message through the output stream

  • Method Details

    • isConnectionActive

      boolean isConnectionActive()
      Check if the connection is active
      Returns:
      true if the connection is active, false otherwise

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage​(Message message)
      Send a message through the output stream
      Parameters:
      message - The Message to send to the Client or Server

    • receiveMessage

      Message receiveMessage() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Receive a message through the input stream
      Returns:
      The Message received
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - ClassNotFoundException
